column3: na wotwaa mu kɔr kwaamu afamu; na wɔsee Jefta dɛ
column4: Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na itwae kɔree kɛnyee Ammonmba koe
column5: na ammfrɛ hɛn na yɛnye wo annkɔ? Yɛdze ogya bɛhyew wo fi egu wo do."

column3: Emi na me man yɛnye Ammonmba nyaa manso kɛse; na aber a mefrɛɛ hom no
column4: hom anngye me emmfi hɔn nsamu."

column2: "Na aber a muhun dɛ hom anngye me no
column3: medze mo nkwa kitsaa me nsamu
column5: na EWURADZE dze hɔn hyɛɛ me nsa. Na afei ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi mbɔ na hom afow aba mo do ndɛ da yi

column3: na ɔnye Efraim koe: na Gilead mbarimba no kum Efraim
column6: hom yɛ eguamfo wɔ Efraim na Manaasɛ mu."

column2: "Na Gileadfo twaar Efraimfo kɛgyee Jordan etwaree no: na ɔbaa dɛ
column3: sɛ Efraim eguamfo no bi se dɛ
column5: Gilead mbarimba no bisa no dɛ
column6: Ana Efraimnyi nye wo a? Sɛ ɔse dɛ

column4: Shibolet ; na sɛ ɔka Sibolet; osiandɛ onntum nnka no yie a; nna wɔakyer no
column5: na woeku no wɔ Jordan etwaree hɔ: na aber no mu Efraim mu nyimpa mpemeduanan ebien totɔree."

column2: "Na Jefta dzii Israel enyim mfe esia. Nna Gileadnyi Jefta wui
column3: na wosiee no wɔ Gilead nkurow no kor mu."

column2: "Na Jefta n’ekyir no Ibzan a ofi Bɛtlɛhɛm dzii Israel enyim."
"Nna ɔwɔ mbabanyin eduasa na mbabaa so eduasa
column3: na ogyaa mbabaa eduasa kwan kɔr awar wɔ mbeambea
column4: na ɔdze mbabaa eduasa fi mbeambea brɛɛ ne mbabanyin no. Na odzii Israel enyim mfe esuon."

column2: "Na ɔno n’ekyir no Zebulunnyi Elon dzii Israel enyim; mfe du."

column3: na wosiee no wɔ Aijalon wɔ Zebulun asaase do."

column2: "Na ɔno n’ekyir no Piratonnyi Hilel ne babanyin Abdon buu Israel atsɛn."
"Nna ɔwɔ mbabanyin eduanan na mbabanyin hɔn mbabanyin eduasa a wɔtsenaa asoasopɔnkɔ mba eduosuon do: na odzii Israel enyim mfe awɔtwe."
"Na Piratonnyi Hilel ne babanyin Abdon wui
column3: na wosiee no wɔ Piratom wɔ Efraim asaase do
column4: wɔ Amalekfo nkokodo nkurow no mu."
